description: '''Ahez''' is a French vocal group from [[Carhaix-Plouguer|Carhaix]], [[Brittany (administrative region)|Brittany]], consisting of Marine Lavigne, Sterenn Diridollou and Sterenn Le Guillou. The trio [[France in the Eurovision Song Contest 2022|represented France]] in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2022]] together with [[Alvan (musician)|Alvan]] with the song "[[Fulenn]]".
